snippet: Firefighters contained a small fire that broke out amid construction debris on the 89th floor of 1 World Trade Center, slightly injuring the firefighter.
abstract: Firefighters contain a small fire that breaks out amid construction debris on the 89th floor of 1 World Trade Center, slightly injuring one firefighter.
lead_paragraph: Firefighters contained a small fire that broke out amid construction debris on the 89th floor of 1 World Trade Center, slightly injuring the firefighter.

headline.seo: Firefighter Is Hurt in Blaze At 1 World Trade Center
headline.main: Work Materials Catch Fire at 1 World Trade Center Site
headline.print_headline: Work Materials Catch Fire At 1 World Trade Center Site
